name: Slovenské elektrárne, a.s.
bossPosition: Chairman of the Board of Director and CEO
goal: At national level, Slovenské elektrárne is the biggest electricity producer in Slovakia with 69% of the country’s generation market. Slovenské elektrárne is the main supplier of electricity and ancillary services in Slovakia. It operates two nuclear, two thermal and 31 hydro power plants generating  almost 90% of electricity without greehouse gas emissions.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives: European legislation in the energy sector, including the Energy Union, energy efficiency, renewables, internal energy market, nuclear safety and liability, energy infrastructure, European environmental legislation, energy regulation and competition issues.
